lines.text: Have you ever been here before?
No sir. And I wouldn't be here now 'lessin' I was forced to come.
I suppose you know why Officer Weems arrested you.
Yessir. Because I was the smallest kid he could catch.
Washington, I'm going to let you go, but I want you to promise me never to take anything that doesn't belong to you. And I don't want to ever see you in this courtroom again.
How come, Judge? You gonna quit?
